name: Phantom Warrior
languages: any languages it knew in life

abilities.name: Ethereal Sight.
abilities.description: The phantom warrior can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement.
abilities.description: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

abilities.name: Spectral Armor and Shield.
abilities.description: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.
